author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...NARDA LIKELY TO INTENSIFY WHILE REMAINING OFFSHORE OF MEXICO...
summary: ...NARDA LIKELY TO INTENSIFY WHILE REMAINING OFFSHORE OF MEXICO... As of 9:00 PM CST Sun Sep 21 the center of Narda was located near 15.3, -100.5 with movement NW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...NARDA LIKELY TO INTENSIFY WHILE REMAINING OFFSHORE OF MEXICO... As of 9:00 PM CST Sun Sep 21 the center of Narda was located near 15.3, -100.5 with movement NW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Narda (EP4/EP142025)
